explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow shirt, with his mouth open, holds a soccer ball in his hand, standing in front of a sandy area, behind which are white buildings.
[0-2] Then the man in the yellow shirt throws the soccer ball forward. The scene changes, the soccer ball flies past a little boy in a gray shirt and blue shoes, and lands in a concrete pipe.
[0-2] Then the man in the yellow shirt throws the soccer ball forward. The scene changes, the soccer ball flies past a little boy in a gray shirt and blue shoes, and lands in a concrete pipe.
[2-4] Immediately the camera switches, and the soccer ball rolls into the depths of the concrete pipe.
